text: But I think what Rud is very good at is the culture clash between these 2 countries, that they see each other in totally, totally different ways, that China sees the US In terms of betraying them, giving their territory to Japan after the First World War, not helping them against during the 2nd World War playing silly games, balancing them against the Soviet Union for US interests in the seventies And basically think that America is entirely cynical.
